problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following statements of storage are true?<< [x] Human body is a system of energy storage. [x] The supermarket requires inventory because of the uncertainty associated with product demand. [x] The storage system can increase the reliability and stability of complex system. [x] Storage comes with risk and cost.
[explanation] Human body is a energy storage system; No-synchronization is the cause of inventory; The purpose of storage is to reduce the instability and fragility of complex, expensive system; Storage comes with risks(demanding risk, theft/loss/natural damage) and cost(operating, warehouse holding fees). Thus, all of them are correct. [explanation]
